Sentencas: Does generation of zero-carbon electricity from coal make sense for a decarbonized grid?
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Coal-based integrated gasification fuel cell systems with CO2 capture have the potential to participate in future decarbonized power grids.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Over the next decade, such systems are scheduled to progress from a conceptual scheme to its first demonstration projects in China and Japan.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: A key issue in the long-term viability of the technology will be reducing costs so they are competitive against other forms of zero-carbon electricity; in addition, the systems must be able to operate as part of low carbon grids.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: We systematically evaluate the major on-going research directions, and rank them according to their economic potential, degree of technical challenge, and possible synergies with other efforts to transition to low-carbon energy systems worldwide.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Our analysis indicates that the most promising pathway to making integrated gasification fuel cell technologies cost-competitive against other forms of low-carbon electricity is co-deployment of solid oxide fuel cell technologies in integrated gasification fuel cell cycle and distributed energy applications to expand the scale of production to a level that benefits both areas.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Other avenues based on system optimization or improvements in fuel cell performance or degradation through materials development can help, but cannot by themselves deliver cost-competitive electricity absent an order of magnitude reduction in the cost of solid oxide fuel cell components.
Titulo: Prospects for cost-competitive integrated gasification fuel cell systems
